00018 #include "OSPFInterfaceStateNotDesignatedRouter.h"
00019 #include "OSPFInterfaceStateDown.h"
00020 #include "OSPFInterfaceStateLoopback.h"
00021 #include "OSPFArea.h"
00022 #include "OSPFRouter.h"
00023 #include "MessageHandler.h"
00024 
00025 void OSPF::InterfaceStateNotDesignatedRouter::ProcessEvent(OSPF::Interface* intf, OSPF::Interface::InterfaceEventType event)
00026 {
00027     if (event == OSPF::Interface::NeighborChange) {
00028         CalculateDesignatedRouter(intf);
00029     }
00030     if (event == OSPF::Interface::InterfaceDown) {
00031         intf->Reset();
00032         ChangeState(intf, new OSPF::InterfaceStateDown, this);
00033     }
00034     if (event == OSPF::Interface::LoopIndication) {
00035         intf->Reset();
00036         ChangeState(intf, new OSPF::InterfaceStateLoopback, this);
00037     }
00038     if (event == OSPF::Interface::HelloTimer) {
00039         if (intf->GetType() == OSPF::Interface::Broadcast) {
00040             intf->SendHelloPacket(OSPF::AllSPFRouters);
00041         } else {    // OSPF::Interface::NBMA
00042             if (intf->GetRouterPriority() > 0) {
00043                 unsigned long neighborCount = intf->GetNeighborCount();
00044                 for (unsigned long i = 0; i < neighborCount; i++) {
00045                     const OSPF::Neighbor* neighbor = intf->GetNeighbor(i);
00046                     if (neighbor->GetPriority() > 0) {
00047                         intf->SendHelloPacket(neighbor->GetAddress());
00048                     }
00049                 }
00050             } else {
00051                 intf->SendHelloPacket(intf->GetDesignatedRouter().ipInterfaceAddress);
00052                 intf->SendHelloPacket(intf->GetBackupDesignatedRouter().ipInterfaceAddress);
00053             }
00054         }
00055         intf->GetArea()->GetRouter()->GetMessageHandler()->StartTimer(intf->GetHelloTimer(), intf->GetHelloInterval());
00056     }
00057     if (event == OSPF::Interface::AcknowledgementTimer) {
00058         intf->SendDelayedAcknowledgements();
00059     }
00060 }
